categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starfighter squadrons

nodes.text: Tiger Squadron was a squadron of 4 Z-95 Headhunters that was the first of two groups of fighters in the MC80a Star Cruiser Ardent. The squadron was destroyed by TIE Avengers that engaged the cruiser. The cruiser was badly damaged before escaping into Hyperspace. The battle was reconstructed to train TIE Avenger pilots such as Maarek Stele.
